# Search Orphan Drug Designations and Approvals

  * [![Print](/scripts/includes/images/img_fdagov_utility_icon_print.png)](javascript:window.print\(\); "Print this page")
  * [![Share](/scripts/includes/images/img_fdagov_utility_icon_share.png)](http://www.addthis.com/bookmark.php?u508=true&v=152&username=fdamain "Share this page")1
  * [![E-mail](/scripts/includes/images/img_fdagov_utility_icon_email.png)](http://www.addthis.com/bookmark.php "E-mail this page")2



  * [FDA Home](https://www.fda.gov/)3
  * [Developing Products for Rare Diseases & Conditions](http://www.fda.gov/ForIndustry/DevelopingProductsforRareDiseasesConditions/default.htm)4



- 

Generic Name:  |  autologous ex vivo expanded polyclonal CD4plusCD25plusCD127 lo/- FOXP3plus regulatory T cells (CELZ-101)   
---|---  
Date Designated:  |  03/05/2024   
Orphan Designation:  |  Prevention of allograft rejection in patients undergoing pancreatic islet cell transplantation   
Orphan Designation Status:  |  Designated   
FDA Orphan Approval Status:  |  Not FDA Approved for Orphan Indication   
Sponsor:  |  Creative Medical Technology Holdings, Inc211 E. Osborn Rd.Phoenix, Arizona 85012United States _The sponsor address listed is the last reported by the sponsor to OOPD._  
  
*Exclusivity Protected Indications are shown for approvals from 01/01/2013 to the present. *Data for the Date Designation Withdrawn or Revoked field are shown for designations withdrawn or revoked after 08/12/2013. 

- 

-
